abstract: The iPhone directs prospective donors out of the donation app and to the organization’s Web site, making the process more cumbersome.
snippet: The iPhone directs prospective donors out of the donation app and to the organization’s Web site, making the process more cumbersome.
lead_paragraph: The nonprofit world is stewing over the ban Apple has put on making donations on the iPhone via charity apps.

headline.main: Donations Ban on iPhone Apps Irritates Nonprofits
headline.print_headline: Donations Ban on iPhone Apps Irritates Nonprofits
